news.title: FTC upholds ban on stalkerware founder Scott Zuckerman
news.summary: Zuckerman, who used to run the stalkerware apps SpyFone and SpyTrac, claimed the ban is hurting his unrelated business.

news.title: SoftBank and Nvidia reportedly in talks to fund Skild AI at $14B, nearly tripling its value
news.summary: Skild AI is developing a hardware-agnostic foundation model for robots that can be customized for various uses.

news.title: Investor letter reveals skyrocketing growth of Waymo’s robotaxi rides
news.summary: Six months ago, Waymo disclosed it was providing 250,000 robotaxi rides. But it's grown significantly since, a leaked letter says.

news.title: Department of Commerce approves Nvidia H200 chip exports to China
news.summary: This news comes as a bill was introduced in Congress last week to prevent these exact kinds of chip exports.

news.title: Google’s AI try-on app Doppl adds a shoppable discovery feed
news.summary: The tech giant says the idea behind the new feed is to display recommendations so users can discover and virtually try on items. Nearly everything in the feed is shoppable, with direct links to merchants.

news.title: The Military Almost Got the Right to Repair. Lawmakers Just Took It Away
news.summary: The final language of the annual bill that funds the US military is in. It removes provisions that would have helped ensure service members’ ability to fix their own equipment.

news.title: Dr. Oz Tells His Federal Employees to Eat Less
news.summary: “You don’t have to try every cookie on the holiday table,” wrote Mehmet Oz in an email to all Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services staffers.

news.title: OpenAI Should Stop Naming Its Creations After Products That Already Exist
news.summary: From “cameo” to “io,” OpenAI keeps trying to call its new and upcoming releases by names that resemble existing trademarks.

news.title: For the First Time, Mutations in a Single Gene Have Been Linked to Mental Illness
news.summary: Research links variations in the gene GRIN2A to a higher risk of developing schizophrenia and other forms of mental illness.
